Description:
INSJD231121.1-312089269
You have failed to ensure that the exposure of your employees of a substance hazardous to health, namely isocyanate, has been adequately controlled in that you have not provided air fed breathing apparatus of a suitable specification.

INSJD231121.2-312089341
You have failed to ensure that the air fed breathing apparatus provided to control exposure of employees to substances hazardous to health, namely isocyanate, has been thoroughly examined and tested at suitable intervals.

INSJD231121.3-312089346
You have failed to ensure that the local exhaust ventilation unit that is provided to control exposure of employees to substances hazardous to health, namely isocyanate, has been thoroughly examined and tested every 14 months.

INSJD231121.4-312089351
You have failed to provide health surveillance to employees who are liable to be exposed to substances hazardous to health, namely isocyanate.

INSJD231121.5-312089358
You have failed to ensure that the exposure of your employees to a substance hazardous to health, namely isocyanate, is monitored in accordance with a suitable procedure.
